text:
mAqyA mAqyinA$M ~MviSvaminvaq tvE pUqrvIH sa#ndaqdhuH pRu#ShTabandhO || 
diqvO nO# vRuqShTiM ma#rutO rarIddhvaqM prapi#nvataq vRuShNOq aSva#syaq dhArA$H | 
aqrvA~gEqtEna# stanayiqtnunEhyaqpO ni#Shiq~jcannasu#raH piqtA na#H || 
pinva#ntyaqpO maqruta#H suqdAna#vaqH payO# GRuqtava#dviqdathE$ShvAq Buva#H | 
atyaqM na miqhE vi na#yanti vAqjinaqmuthsa#M duhanti staqnaya#ntaqmakShi#taM || 
uqdaqprutO# marutaqstA(gm) i#yartaq vRuShTiqM - [  ]   41
